posts.title: Vitruvian Man Action Figure
posts.content: Explore the correlation of ideal human proportions with this Vitruvian man action figure. He comes with articulated joints so you can place him in a variety of positions, and features a paint job that makes it seem like he was torn directly out of da Vinci’s sketchbook.

posts.title: Bring Me Some Wine Socks
posts.content: Say what’s on your mind without uttering a single word while wearing these “bring me some wine” socks. These white cotton socks provide a soft comfy fit that’ll keep your feet toasty – making this a great gift for the lazy wine lover in your life.

posts.title: Secret Compartment Pillow Safe
posts.content: Keep your valued possessions safe by concealing them in the secret compartment pillow. Thanks to this comfortable pillow you’ll be able to stash your goods – like candy, drugs, cash, etc. – in an easily accessible location that no one would ever think to look in.

posts.title: Robotic Hatching Animal Eggs
posts.content: Win parent of the year by surprising your kid with their very own robotic hatching animal egg. Once their adorable little critter hatches, your kid will be able to listen to its heartbeat and even teach it how to walk, talk, dance, and play games.

posts.title: Supergal Bookend
posts.content: Who better to valiantly hold up your literary collection than Supergal? This sure-fire conversation piece employs the use of a small magnet to suspend Supergal in the air and create the illusion she’s flying while holding up your books with her super-strength.

posts.title: Spartan Warrior Knife Block
posts.content: Keep your kitchen cutlery ready for action when you store them in the Spartan warrior knife block. This novelty piece is crafted from fine maple wood and made in the image of a Spartan warrior who is fending off your attack with his trusty shield.

posts.title: Dog Play Tunnel
posts.content: Set up a canine playground old Sparky will enjoy for hours on end in mere seconds with the dog play tunnel. The tunnel pops open in a flash to create a fun and appealing place for your doggy to play in and folds flat just as easily for convenient storage.

posts.title: Cracked iPhone Screen Repair Kit
posts.content: Save yourself a small fortune next time your phone gets a boo-boo by taking matters into your own hands using this cracked iPhone screen repair kit. It includes everything you’ll need to revive your phone from the dead and get the screen looking brand new.

posts.title: Santa Claus Toilet Cover
posts.content: Get revenge on the fat man for bringing you coal last Christmas by dropping off a “special gift” down his chimney. This four piece Santa Claus toilet cover will get your whole family into the Holiday spirit, though you may not like that passion they exhibit.

posts.title: World’s Toughest Coffee Maker
posts.content: With the world’s toughest coffee maker at your disposal, nothing will stand in the way of getting your piping cup of joe. The extremely rugged design of this coffee brewer is built to perform in the harshest of environments – making it ideal for construction jobs.

posts.title: .50 Caliber Bullet Folding Knife
posts.content: Disguise your weapon in the ammo of another weapon with the .50 caliber bullet folding knife. Traditionally used for sniper rifles, this .50 caliber bullet has been modified to house a sleek 4″ blade for jobs that requires a more up-close and personal touch.

posts.title: Goldfish Ice Cube Mold
posts.content: Create a world of sparkling icy fish with the goldfish ice cube mold. This mold lets you creates ice or candy that resemble Japanese koi — each scale and fin being more beautiful than the last. The realism means you can freak out your friends with goldfish in their drinks.
